description: You are standing at the entrance to the dungeon.
The cold, misty air bites at your cheeks as the chill wind whips at your cloak.

exits.name: NORTH
exits.description: The yawing mouth of the maze is before you. The air as black an thick as tar.

exits.name: SOUTH
exits.description: Behind you, to the south, are rolling fields and the way back home.

description: You have successfully made it through this single room puzzle. Good for you, champ!
You turn to face the setting sun, your fight will wait for another day.

exits.name: NORTH
exits.unlockedDescription: To the north of you is the intimidating castle zanbar.
